question.ask: Questions 1~2  You plan to visit Tibet during your summer vacation and one of your classmates has been there. Ask him two questions.

std.value: How was your trip in Tibet? Do you think it worth visiting Tibet?
std.ai: How was your trip in Tibet? Do you think it worth visiting Tibet?

std.value: What do I need to take with me if I want to travel to Tibet? How much money should I take with me?
std.ai: What do I need to take with me if I want to travel to Tibet? How much money should I take with me?

std.value: Should I take a plane or a train to Tibet? How long do you think I should stay in Tibet?
std.ai: Should I take a plane or a train to Tibet? How long do you think I should stay in Tibet?

std.value: What do you think the life in Tibet? Do you think it worth visiting Tibet?
std.ai: What do you think the life in Tibet? Do you think it worth visiting Tibet?

std.value: What are the famous places of interest in Tibet? What’s the most famous food in Tibet?
std.ai: What are the famous places of interest in Tibet? What’s the most famous food in Tibet?

std.value: What places should I visit in Tibet? How can I plan the route to visit Tibet?
std.ai: What places should I visit in Tibet? How can I plan the route to visit Tibet?

std.value: Did you enjoy your trip in Tibet? Do you think it worth visiting Tibet?
std.ai: Did you enjoy your trip in Tibet? Do you think it worth visiting Tibet?

std.value: How do you like Tibet? Are there any taboos I should pay attention to in Tibet?
std.ai: How do you like Tibet? Are there any taboos I should pay attention to in Tibet?

std.value: Did you enjoy your trip in Tibet? Where would you recommend me to visit in Tibet?
std.ai: Did you enjoy your trip in Tibet? Where would you recommend me to visit in Tibet?

std.value: Do you have any special experiences in Tibet? What are the famous places of interest in Tibet?
std.ai: Do you have any special experiences in Tibet? What are the famous places of interest in Tibet?

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your friend Li Gang is going to write an article on space flight. Ask him two questions.

std.value: Are you going to write an article on space flight? Why are you going to write an article on such a topic?
std.ai: Are you going to write an article on space flight? Why are you going to write an article on such a topic?

std.value: What do you know about space flight? What will the readers learn from your article?
std.ai: What do you know about space flight? What will the readers learn from your article?

std.value: Are you going to write an article on space flight? What are you going to write about it?
std.ai: Are you going to write an article on space flight? What are you going to write about it?

std.value: What is the main idea of your article? How will you search the information about space flight?
std.ai: What is the main idea of your article? How will you search the information about space flight?

std.value: What are you going to write about space flight? Do you have any other articles for reference?
std.ai: What are you going to write about space flight? Do you have any other articles for reference?

std.value: Are you very interested in space flight? What do you know about space flight?
std.ai: Are you very interested in space flight? What do you know about space flight?

std.value: Why are you going to write an article on space flight? What will the readers learn from your article?
std.ai: Why are you going to write an article on space flight? What will the readers learn from your article?

std.value: What are you going to write about space flight? How will you search the information about it?
std.ai: What are you going to write about space flight? How will you search the information about it?

std.value: Why are you going to write an article on space flight? Are you very interested in space flight?
std.ai: Why are you going to write an article on space flight? Are you very interested in space flight?

std.value: How will you search the information about space flight? Do you have any other articles for reference?
std.ai: How will you search the information about space flight? Do you have any other articles for reference?
